node.context:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html lang="en">
<head>
<title>[% return $NODE->{title} %][% 

if($NODE->{type}->{title} eq "writeup")
{
 my $author = getNodeById($NODE->{author_user});
 if($author)
 {
   return " by $$author{title}";
 }
}
%] - Everything2.com</title>
	<link rel="stylesheet" id="basesheet" type="text/css" href="[{linkStylesheet:basesheet}]" media="all">
[%
'	<link rel="stylesheet" id="zensheet" type="text/css" href="'
                 . htmlcode('linkStylesheet', $$VARS{userstyle}||$$THEME{default_style}, 'serve')
                 . '" media="screen,tv,projection">' ;
%][%

if (exists(($$VARS{customstyle})) && defined(($$VARS{customstyle}))) {
	return '
	<style type="text/css">
' . htmlScreen($$VARS{customstyle}) . '
	</style>' ;
}
%]
	<link rel="stylesheet" id="printsheet" type="text/css" href="[{linkStylesheet:print}]" media="print">
[%

if ($ENV{HTTP_HOST} !~ /^m\.everything2/i) {
  return '
	<base href="http://' . $Everything::CONF->{canonical_web_server} . '">' if $$USER{ user_id } == $HTMLVARS{ guest_user } ;
}

%]
[%
my $canonical_web_server = $Everything::CONF->{canonical_web_server};
my $url = "";
$url = 'http://'.$canonical_web_server if $$USER{title} eq 'Guest User';
$url .= urlGenNoParams( $NODE , 'noQuotes' ) unless $$NODE{ node_id } eq $HTMLVARS{ default_node } ;
$url ||= '/' ;
return '	<link rel="canonical" href="' . $url . '">' ;

%][%

return unless ($$NODE{type_nodetype}==116||$$NODE{node_id}==1140332||$$NODE{node_id}==668164); # e2nodes, 'Findings:', 'Nothing Found'
return if $$NODE{group} and int( @{ $$NODE{group} } ); #e2node, not nodeshell
return '
	<meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow">'; # Google still seems to index these pages.

%]
        [{metadescriptiontag}]
	<meta name="wisdom" content="Monkey! Bat! Robot Hat!">
	<link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">
	<!--[if lt IE 8]><link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon"><![endif]-->
[%
if ($$NODE{title} eq "Cool Archive") {
    return '	<link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Everything2 Cool Archive" href="/node/ticker/Cool+Archive+Atom+Feed'
	. ( $query->param('cooluser') ? '?foruser='.$query->param('cooluser') : '' ) . '">';
}
else {
	return '	<link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Everything2 New Writeups" href="/node/ticker/New+Writeups+Atom+Feed'
	. ( $$NODE{type_nodetype}==15 ? '?foruser='.$$NODE{title} : '' ) . '">';
}
%]
[{static javascript}]
[{googleanalytics}]
</head>

<body class="[%
my $str = 'writeuppage ' if $$NODE{e2node_id} || $$NODE{writeup_id} || $$NODE{draft_id};
$str .= $$NODE{type}{title} ;
return $str unless $str =~ /superdoc/ ;
#superdocs and variants further identified by title
my $id .= ( $$NODE{ node_id } != 124 ? lc( $$NODE{ 'title' } ) : 'frontpage' ) ;
$id =~ s/\W//g ;
$str.'" id="'.$id ;
%]">
CONTAINED_STUFF
</body>
</html>
node.title: zen stdcontainer
